item.title: 淡马锡支持的印度肉类销售商寻求 20 亿美元的首次公开募股估值
item.description: Licious是淡马锡控股私人有限公司（Temasek Holdings Pte）支持的一家印度肉类和海鲜在线销售商，该公司正努力实现盈利，准备在2026年上市。【原文：Licious, a Temasek Holdings Pte-backed online seller of meat and seafood in India, is seeking to become profitable as it prepares to list in 2026, adding to a slew of consumer-facing firms eyeing the country’s public markets.】

item.title: 石油保持升势，欧佩克+可能推迟增加供应
item.description: 由于欧佩克+代表称该组织正在考虑推迟恢复产量，以及乌克兰无人机袭击了俄罗斯的一个原油泵站，石油在上涨后趋于平稳。【原文：Oil steadied after an advance as OPEC+ delegates said the group was considering delaying restoring output, and Ukrainian drones attacked a crude-pumping station in Russia.】

item.title: 财报在即，百度股价大幅跑输大盘成焦点
item.description: 百度公司将于周二发布的财报可能会为投资者提供线索，让他们知道这家中国互联网搜索行业的领头羊股价表现落后是否有理由。【原文：Results due Tuesday from Baidu Inc. may provide investors clues on whether the Chinese internet search leader’s lagging share price performance is warranted or not.】

item.title: SBI 支持的日本机器人顾问公司 Folio 目标是扭亏为盈和首次公开募股
item.description: 日本机器人顾问公司Folio Holdings Co.首席执行官Shinichiro Kai在接受采访时表示，这家由SBI Holdings Inc.支持的初创公司正在寻求上市，以便在一个急需扩张的市场中实现盈利。【原文：Japanese robo-adviser Folio Holdings Co. is looking to go public as the SBI Holdings Inc.-backed startup zeros in on profitability in a market primed for expansion, Chief Executive Officer Shinichiro Kai said in an interview.】

item.title: 美联储主席沃勒尔赞成暂停降息直至通胀回落
item.description: 美联储理事克里斯托弗-沃勒（Christopher Waller）表示，近期的经济数据支持按兵不动，但如果通胀表现与2024年一样，决策者可以 "在今年的某个时候 "重新开始降息。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller said recent economic data support keeping interest rates on hold, but if inflation behaves as it did in 2024, policymakers can get back to cutting “at some point this year.”】

item.title: 欧洲股市上涨后，亚洲股市走高：市场综述
item.description: 在欧洲，增加军费开支的可能性提升了国防公司的股价和债券收益率。【原文：Stocks in Asia are broadly set to track gains in Europe, where the likelihood of greater military spending lifted shares in defense companies and bond yields.】

item.title: 前员工称印度最大的 IT 公司在玩弄美国签证系统
item.description:
最新数据显示了 TCS 如何大量使用为管理人员保留的工作签证。前员工称这是为了规避 H-1B 规定。【原文：

New data show how TCS makes heavy use of employment visas reserved for managers. Ex-staffers say it was to get around H-1B rules.

】

item.title: 日本历史性的利率调整为信贷市场注入了动力
item.description: 日本企业债券市场正在蓬勃发展，因为经济反弹和在利率上调前抢占先机的计划鼓励了大量债券发行。【原文：Japan’s corporate bond market is booming, as an economic rebound and plans to get ahead of higher interest rates encourage a flurry of issuance.】

item.title: 必和必拓上半年利润下滑 23%，矿商削减股息
item.description: 必和必拓集团（BHP Group Ltd.）上半年利润同比下滑 23%，该矿业巨头受到中国对铁矿石和铜等主要大宗商品需求下降的影响。【原文：BHP Group Ltd.’s first-half profit slumped 23% from the year before, with the mining giant impacted by falling Chinese demand for key commodities including iron ore and copper.】

item.title: 泰国航空公司计划将机队规模扩大一倍，摆脱债务困扰
item.description: 在泰国国际航空公司（Thai Airways International Pcl）申请破产保护五年后，这家国有控股航空公司的法院指定债务管理人 Piyasvasti Amranand 正计划积极进行国际扩张。【原文：Five years after Thai Airways International Pcl filed for bankruptcy protection, the state-controlled carrier’s court-appointed debt administrator Piyasvasti Amranand is planning an aggressive international expansion.】

item.title: 澳大利亚养老金重投地方债务，成为贸易战避风港
item.description: 经过多年的海外投资后，澳大利亚一些最大的养老基金正在国内购买更多的政府债券；在贸易战风险扰动市场的情况下，这些基金现在认为政府债券是最安全的资产之一。【原文：After years of venturing offshore, some of Australia’s biggest pension funds are scooping up more government bonds at home — assets they now deem among the safest as trade-war risks rattle markets.】

item.title: 新加坡准备在大选年增加支出
item.description: 在全球不确定性加剧、国内成本上升的情况下，新加坡很可能在黄遵宪担任总理后的首份预算案中增加支出，在大选前向家庭和企业提供更多援助。【原文：Singapore is likely to boost spending in Lawrence Wong’s first budget as prime minister, offering more handouts to households and businesses ahead of election at a time of heightened global uncertainty and elevated costs at home.】

item.title: OpenAI 联合创始人 Sutskever 的初创公司正在以 300 亿美元以上的估值进行融资
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，OpenAI 联合创始人伊利亚-苏茨克沃（Ilya Sutskever）正在为他的初创公司筹集超过 10 亿美元的资金，估值超过 300 亿美元。【原文：OpenAI co-founder Ilya Sutskever is raising more than $1 billion for his startup at a valuation of over $30 billion, according to a person familiar with the matter — vaulting the nascent venture into the ranks of the world’s most valuable private technology companies.】

item.title: 前 Pimco 高管准备推出全球首只巨灾债券 ETF
item.description: 近年来，巨灾债券的回报率一直高于高收益债务市场，现在即将有更多的投资者可以购买巨灾债券。【原文：Catastrophe bonds, whose returns have consistently trounced those of high-yield debt markets in recent years, are about to become accessible to a wider group of investors.】

item.title: 东布罗夫斯基斯称特朗普贸易不确定性正冲击欧盟经济
item.description: 欧盟经济委员瓦尔蒂斯-东布罗夫斯基斯（Valdis Dombrovskis）表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普计划对欧盟征收关税所带来的贸易不确定性已经影响到欧盟，使投资受到抑制。【原文：Trade uncertainty over US President Donald Trump’s plans to hit the European Union with tariffs is already affecting the bloc by putting a lid on investment, according to EU Economy Commissioner Valdis Dombrovskis.】

item.title: 卢拉敦促巴西国家石油公司砍掉 "抢劫 "消费者的燃料中间商
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）周一表示，巴西国营石油生产商巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）应摆脱中间商，直接向消费者销售，以降低燃料价格。【原文：Brazil’s state-run oil producer Petrobras should get rid of intermediaries and sell directly to consumers in order to lower fuel prices, President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva said Monday.】

item.title: 英国国家财富基金总裁约翰-弗林特计划下台
item.description: 英国国家财富基金领导人约翰-弗林特（John Flint）将于今年夏天卸任，这是他被任命领导这个新成立的组织数月之后的事。【原文：John Flint, the leader of the UK’s National Wealth Fund, will step down this summer, months after he was named to lead the newly formed organization.】

item.title: 埃塞俄比亚与私人股本公司合作开展价值 6 亿美元的乳制品项目
item.description: 埃塞俄比亚主权财富基金与英国私募股权公司 Asset Green 签署了一份股东协议，在这个非洲之角的国家投资 6 亿美元建设奶牛养殖和加工项目。【原文：Ethiopia’s sovereign wealth fund has signed a shareholder agreement with UK private equity firm Asset Green for a $600 million dairy farming and processing project in the Horn of Africa nation.】

item.title: 能源行业发展滞后，2024 年哥伦比亚经济低速增长
item.description: 由于石油、天然气和煤炭行业萎缩，同时紧缩的货币政策阻碍了制造业的发展，哥伦比亚又经历了经济增长乏力的一年。【原文：Colombia suffered another year of weak economic growth as the oil, gas and coal sectors contracted while tight monetary policy held back manufacturing.】

item.title: 欧洲央行降息决策越来越难：霍尔兹曼致经济流
item.description: 据 Econostream 报道，欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员罗伯特-霍尔兹曼（Robert Holzmann）表示，继续降息的决定正变得越来越困难。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Robert Holzmann said decisions to continue lowering interest rates are becoming more difficult, according to Econostream.】

item.title: 威廉姆森计划提前离职，老互惠开始物色首席执行官
item.description: Old Mutual Ltd. 正着手物色新的首席执行官，以接替执掌公司五年后将于 8 月底卸任的 Iain Williamson。【原文：Old Mutual Ltd. is embarking on a search for a new chief executive officer to replace Iain Williamson who will step down at the end of August after five years at the helm.】

item.title: 新西兰央行将第三次降息半点以振兴经济
item.description: 新西兰央行将连续第三次大幅降息，并发出今年进一步降息以重振经济增长的信号。【原文：New Zealand’s central bank is set to deliver its third big interest-rate cut in a row and signal further reductions this year to rekindle economic growth.】

item.title: 津巴布韦最大零售商呼吁 ZiG 自由浮动
item.description: 南部非洲国家最大的连锁超市 OK 津巴布韦有限公司呼吁当局放开汇率，以帮助重振陷入困境的正规零售业。【原文：OK Zimbabwe Ltd., the southern African nation’s biggest supermarket chain, called on the authorities to free-float the exchange rate to help revive the embattled formal retail sector.】

item.title: 韦丹塔债权人周二开会就印度分拆计划进行表决
item.description: 韦丹塔公司（Vedanta Ltd.）的债权人将于周二举行会议，对将这家印度矿业企业集团拆分为至少五家不同企业的计划做出最终裁决，这是该集团长达数月之久的努力中的关键一步，旨在简化集团结构，帮助管理其债务负担。【原文：Vedanta Ltd.’s creditors will meet Tuesday to give their final verdict on a plan to split the Indian mining conglomerate into at least five different businesses, a key step in a months-long effort to simplify the group’s structure and help manage its debt burden.】

item.title: 西方联盟的分歧令乌克兰债券涨势存疑
item.description: 随着北约盟国开始就乌克兰的未来发生冲突，新兴市场投资者开始质疑乌克兰债券还有多少上涨空间。【原文：Emerging-market investors are beginning to question how much more upside exists in Ukraine’s bonds as NATO allies begin to clash over the nation’s future.】

item.title: 美联储鲍曼看到银行监管不作为的 "令人担忧的趋势
item.description: 美联储理事米歇尔-鲍曼（Michelle Bowman）呼吁减少银行监管的不透明性，称监督和监管方法需要更新，以便更好地服务于金融体系。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Michelle Bowman called for less opacity in bank oversight, saying the supervisory and regulatory approach needs updating so it better serves the financial system.】

item.title: 巴西顶级制糖企业 Raizen 将出售资产、削减投资
item.description: 巴西借贷成本飙升后，巴西最大的糖和乙醇生产商 Raizen SA 正在研究潜在的资产出售，并停止建设新工厂的项目，以努力减少债务。【原文：Brazil’s largest sugar and ethanol maker Raizen SA is looking at potential asset sales and halting projects to build new plants in an effort to reduce debt after borrowing costs soared in the country.】

item.title: 战争挤压投资和出口，2024 年以色列经济增长放缓
item.description: 去年，以色列的经济增长速度是二十多年来最慢的，这还不包括 "Covid-19 "大流行病的影响。【原文：Israel’s economy grew at its slowest pace in over two decades last year, excluding the Covid-19 pandemic, underlining the toll of wars fought in Gaza and Lebanon throughout much of the year.】

item.title: 美联储哈克支持维持利率不变，称政策仍具限制性
item.description: 费城联邦储备银行行长帕特里克-哈克（Patrick Harker）表示，在官员们等待通胀取得更多进展之际，货币政策已做好准备。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Philadelphia President Patrick Harker said monetary policy is well positioned as officials wait for more progress on inflation.】

item.title: General Atlantic 收购总部位于迪拜的 Huda Beauty 香水部门
item.description: General Atlantic 同意收购化妆品公司 Huda Beauty 旗下快速增长的香水部门的股份，这是迪拜企业吸引国际投资者兴趣的最新例证。【原文：General Atlantic agreed to buy a stake in the fast-growing perfume division of cosmetics company Huda Beauty, the latest example of a business based in Dubai drawing interest from international investors.】
